title: Identify titration type from pH curve

content.prompt: A student performs an acid-base titration and plots the experimental results in the graph above. Which of the following statements best explains the experimental findings?

choices.label: A strong acid was titrated with a strong base, as evidenced by the equivalence point at pH = 7.
A strong acid was titrated with a strong base, as evidenced by the equivalence point at pH > 7.
A weak acid was titrated with a strong base, as evidenced by the equivalence point at pH > 7.
A weak acid was titrated with a weak base, as evidenced by the equivalence point at pH approximately 7.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
